caption.p: Photomicrograph of liver, kidney and spleen in repeated-dose E. Kebericho EO oral toxicity study. All liver including female (from control to highest dose, 1–4) and male (from control to highest dose 5-8) ‘showed normal morphology architecture. ‘All kidneys (9-16) showed normal morphology except medium dose treated female (200 mg/kg). ‘Spleen of all groups (17–24) showed normal morphology, H&E, magnification 10×.
